title: May and Mark Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Thai, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu includes a vegetarian section offering Thai and Western fare like sauteed tofu in basil-chili sauce, burritos, and smoothies. It is known more for its  baked breads and sweets. Moved to Soi 10 from Soi 2, now on the corner adjacent to the 7/11 store and the food market.
